characters.name: Hirotaka Nifuji
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184 cm

He specializes in video games, but he also reads a lot of manga and watches a lot of anime. (He likes all kinds of games, but he's especially fond of FPS games, fighting games and action games, where it's not necessary to level up.) He goes for one person in video games and finds everything from visuals to status as being important.

He prefers e-mail for communication as the tension isn't as high as it is otherwise.

characters.name: Narumi Momose
characters.description:
__Height:__ 154 cm

Manga, comics and cosplay are up her alley, and at one time she had a superficial knowledge of the fashion scene. She's a fan of multiple genres, loving many of them at the same time.

__Sake:__ She actually has a pretty strong tolerance.
__Smoking:__ She doesn't smoke, but likes guys who do smoke.

She's known Hirotaka since childhood (the one responsible for getting her into the otaku life) and is the only one who really knows about her being an otaku.

characters.name: Hanako Koyanagi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 167 cm (5'6")

She likes things like drama and stage theatre. She also has a soft spot for anime and manga, as well as BL. She admires wifely characters who love someone with all their might. She doesn't have much tolerance for alcohol, so she doesn't bother to drink often, and she smokes very rarely.

characters.name: Tarou Kabakura
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

He's majorly into manga and games, which he has good taste in. He also has good taste in the merchandise he owns. Compared to the typical otaku, however, he falls a little short. Before he gets into new characters, he takes into consideration the guilty feeling he has about crime fiction and married life genres, former wives and current wives meeting genres, and the system type of wife-donos entering temples.

characters.name: Naoya Nifuji
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm

Naoya is a university student and the younger brother of [Hirotaka Nifuji](https://anilist.co/character/122189/Hirotaka-Nifuji) who wants the best for Hirotaka and he is genuinely happy when good things happen to him. He works as a barista in a coffee shop that is next to the office building where his brother is working to. 

Naoya has a cheerful personality who is often portrayed as a cat due to his cat-like smile and he seems to love his work as a barista since having satisfied customers makes him contented.

characters.name: Kou Sakuragi
characters.description: The way she gets absorbed in games bears an uncanny resemblance to a certain someone. Doesn't use any social media sites or apps. Her messages tend to be very long, as if she carefully collected all her thoughts before writing them down. As a result, it takes her a while to send a response since she ends up revising them over and over. “Sorry” and “apologize” always come up first as suggestions when she starts typing. The anxiety she feels from having to send messages or make phone calls is akin to having a heart attack.

characters.name: Yoshiki Ichijou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 167cm

Cheapskate, well-informed, and super perverted. He has been friends with Naoya Nifuji since kindergarten.

characters.name: Baba
characters.description: Hikotaka's co-worker. He is a morose pervert.

One of Naoya's friends. A loud and perverted muscle-head. He has been friends with Naoya Nifuji since kindergarten.
